title: Interpretation of a dream about getting engaged in a man’s dream

preview.html: Seeing an engagement in the dream of a young man, married or unmarried, the engagement of his beloved, his wife, a divorced woman, an unknown girl I do not know, or a girl I know, beautiful or ugly, dark, blonde, white, according to Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of engagement in a man’s dream. If a young man or single person sees that he is preparing or getting ready for an engagement to a girl. If he knows it, he will approach with caution an important issue or event in his life, such as taking on a new job, and the association may indicate the self and sometimes involvement in the vision in the vision. Make a precious wish. Interpretation of engagement or betrothal in a man’s dream according to the beauty and behavior of the fiancée in the dream. This world... Whoever dreams of getting engaged to a girl he knows who is unmarried and beautiful and has a good description, this indicates that he will get what he wants or that it is good news of happiness and joy. Those around him from his family or from work will force him to do something that he does against his will, and he knows that. And whoever sees that he is engaged to a woman whom he knows is married, this indicates that he is seeking something from this world, such as money, position, prestige, honor, or He will obtain it. Whoever proposes in his dream to a virgin or a girl he does not know, or a woman he has never seen before, this indicates that the position is near, if he is from the common people, and if he deserves a great one. location. The explanation for this is that he will obtain the position and authority of a state on earth. Whoever marries an adulteress, this sin will be returned to him and he will also be an adulterer. It is a matter beyond his control, as he indulges in drunkenness or actually marries the daughter of a high-ranking person if he is qualified to do so. Whoever dreams that he is engaged to a woman, he is trying to gain the world and gain from her what he obtained from the engagement. Whoever dreams: to be happy with the woman, this means It indicates his engagement and desire to marry her. Whoever sees: that he is engaged to a married woman, it is clear that he is seeking the world and it will not happen to him. Whoever dreams: that he marries a woman and she responds to his intention, and is beautiful with kindness, to prove that he will fulfill his desire and satisfy his need. Whoever dreams: that a woman proposes to him and wants him, then the world He leans toward him and he comes to him. Interpretation of an engagement to a non-Muslim in a dream: As for a woman engaged or married to a Jew, it indicates an act that is wrong due to the many sins involved. A work full of turmoil and falsehood, but if he is a Zoroastrian, this means that he enters a work without religion or contains major sins during his work. Interpretation of a girl engaged to me in a dreamWhoever saw a dream that an unmarried girl or girl came to his wedding or asked to marry him, this indicates The coming comfort in his life, the opening up of the world to him, and an increase either in food and money or in happiness, pleasure, and giving. Work. Interpretation of an engagement party in a dream. Whoever finds himself at an engagement party for himself or for others and is happy with what is going on around him, this indicates that he will get something from the world that he was looking for, but a wedding party is different from an engagement because a wedding celebration can indicate sadness, anguish, imprisonment, etc. Interpretation of dreams to share - YouTube

title: Interpretation of a dream about a bridge in a dream in detail

preview.html:
Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing the bridge in a dreamIbn Sirin interpreted who crosses the bridge or lends money to it in a dream. This dream indicates the changes that occur in the dreamer’s life and the change can be positive when the bridge extends over one or two banks. Whoever sees that he is crossing the broken bridge in the dream, this dream is a warning sign for the dreamer about something that is about to happen or the direction of an enemy that awaits you. The collapse of the bridge in The dream is a sign of death or failure in the life of the dreamer, and for a married person it can be a sign of divorce and separation. Interpretation of crossing a bridge in a dream: Whoever sees in a dream that he is crossing a high, high bridge. In a dream, this indicates entering a new phase in the life of the dreamer, and there will be a radical change in it. If he is single, he will get married, and this event will be soon or short, depending on the extent of the bridge in the dream. An unmarried woman who sees a high bridge in a dream, this indicates the many fears that allow her and her need for security. And a married woman who sees a bridge in a dream and lends it to her, then this A sign of a radical change in her life, and this change is positive. It could be an increase and expansion of her livelihood or stability in her family life and children. A pregnant woman who dreams that she crosses a bridge easily and smoothly, this is a sign of an easy and quick birth, and seeing a bridge in a dream could mean that the newborn is a male. A divorced woman who sees that she is crossing a bridge in a dream, This is a sign that she is going through a sad and stressful stage in her life and that her future life will be better, God willing. As for the widow who sees in her dream that she is crossing a bridge, this dream indicates that she has passed the stage of sadness, pain and separation. I saw him crossing the bridge easily and successfully. Interpretation of seeing a suspension bridge in a dream: Seeing a high suspension bridge in a dream indicates a dangerous and decisive stage in the dreamer’s life, such as taking a student exam or being exposed to financial risks as a result of taking on a legitimate job that ends successfully and has a positive impact on the dreamer’s life.
ZOE. A high suspension bridge for an unmarried woman indicates a man of high status and has a lot of knowledge and knowledge. A suspension bridge for a married woman in a dream indicates a home free of problems and a bulwark from financial crises. A pregnant woman who sees a suspension bridge in a dream indicates an early and easy birth. For divorced women who dream of a suspension bridge, this dream symbolizes her divorced husband and his inability to return to him. For a widow who sees a suspension bridge in a dream, this indicates that her husband is in exile and that he is deprived of a high and good position in the afterlife. Interpretation of a bridge falling in a dream: A bridge that falls or Collapse in a dream indicates a break in the relationship between people and a break in kinship. For a man who sees a bridge collapsing in a dream, this dream is a sign of failure in managing his affairs. An unmarried woman who sees a bridge collapsing in a dream, this is a sign of the collapse of her emotional relationship. And a wife who sees If a bridge collapses in a dream, this indicates many marital problems and may...

title: Interpretation of a dream about lice for a woman Seeing lice in a dream

preview.html: Contents: A dream about lice in the hair and killing it, for an unmarried woman, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a Shaiban girl, for Imam Al-Sadiq, for Ibn Shirin, for a white dream. Lice to kill from the hair of the head, and more Seeing lice in a dream Seeing lice in a dream or a dream in general indicates the world and money. Whoever sees in his dream that lice are walking on his new clothes, if he has a position or privilege, then this position will be renewed for him. Whoever sees in his dream lice walking On an old, damaged dress, this is a debt that he fears will not recover. And whoever sees lice walking on the ground, this indicates the weakness of people, and if he sees lice biting them, they are weak and unjust. Whoever sees a louse flying from him or from his chest, then the boy or the worker who works for him or his son leaves him, a vision Lice from the king refers to soldiers and enemies. If the dreamer is a minister, then the lice is in gratitude. If he is a teacher or professor, he refers to the students, and if he is sick, then the lice indicates a long-term illness. Whoever dreams of throwing a live louse, the dreamer comes with an order that is contrary to the Sunnah. And whoever sees A lot of lice, then the dream indicates miserable, wretched and humble people and a lot of immorality, and it was said: This is good and relieves one from worries. And whoever is sick and sees a lot of lice, this dream means long-term illness, loss and waste of goods and money, and if he kills her in a dream, this is relief from hardships. Whoever sees in a dream that he has been bitten by lice, then there are weak people who curse him with bad words, and whoever collects lice from clothes, he is deceiving obscene lies. Whoever sees that a lot of lice in his dream are crawling and approaching him, then he will assume leadership or a position over many people, or He rules over many people, or is assigned a part in public affairs. If lice emerge from it in abundance and in large numbers, then his livelihood will increase with the permission of his Lord, and many will come to him from Yemen. Whoever dreams that lice are invading his body and eating his flesh, this means that his children will eat their money. Whoever sees a lot Of lice on his body, unpleasant things will happen to him in the future and there will be no good in him, whether the lice are in his hair or on the rest of his body. Whoever kills a louse or a small number will harm his servant or someone who is less qualified than him. So whoever sees in a dream two or more sexual intercourse or that lice He multiplies in his dream by spitting, then this indicates a quarrel with the one who witnessed sexual intercourse and the multiplication of lice. Lice in a dream refer to the world and money, and many lice in a dream indicate torment and can be a blessing, blessing, goodness, and salvation from worries and sorrows. Lice refer to weak people, and gossip. And for the sick, their illness will be prolonged. For kings, lice are soldiers and enemies. If a louse is found on a new shirt, this indicates the renewal of the mandate, and if it is on a shirt It is an ancient religion that he fears. And if he sees that his lice have flown from his chest, then his son, servant, or servant will stay away from him. And whoever drops a live lice will do something contrary to the Sunnah, and whoever sees a lot of lice, this indicates a long illness, loss, and poverty, and whoever kills the lice, God will relieve him of Comfort him and save him from distress. Who picks the wheat?

Whoever sees a lot Of lice on his body, unpleasant things will happen to him in the future and there will be no good in him, whether the lice are in his hair or on the rest of his body. Whoever kills a louse or a small number will harm his servant or someone who is less qualified than him. So whoever sees in a dream two or more sexual intercourse or that lice He multiplies in his dream by spitting, then this indicates a quarrel with the one who witnessed sexual intercourse and the multiplication of lice. Lice in a dream refer to the world and money, and many lice in a dream indicate torment and can be a blessing, blessing, goodness, and salvation from worries and sorrows. Lice refer to weak people, and gossip. And for the sick, their illness will be prolonged. For kings, lice are soldiers and enemies. If a louse is found on a new shirt, this indicates the renewal of the mandate, and if it is on a shirt It is an ancient religion that he fears. And if he sees that his lice have flown from his chest, then his son, servant, or servant will stay away from him. And whoever drops a live lice will do something contrary to the Sunnah, and whoever sees a lot of lice, this indicates a long illness, loss, and poverty, and whoever kills the lice, God will relieve him of Comfort him and save him from distress. Who picks the wheat?

Scientists have interpreted seeing a cow in a dream as a sign of great kindness and great sustenance.Interpretation of seeing a cow in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing a cow in a dream as evidence of a lot of goodness and longevity. . It also indicates that the owners of this country are generous. However, if this cow is skinny, this indicates the interruption of goodness, the spread of epidemics and diseases, lack of livelihood, and exposure to many problems and troubles, and God Almighty knows best. Interpretation of seeing a cow in a dream for a single woman. Scientists interpreted the vision of an unmarried girl in a dream about a cow as a sign that she will get married soon, as It indicates a lot of sustenance and kindness. Interpretation of seeing a cow in a dream for a married woman. Scientists interpreted a married woman’s vision of a cow in a dream as indicating the enormous wealth and goodness that she may obtain, and the coming will be better and more beautiful. Interpretation of seeing a cow in a dream for a pregnant woman. Scientists interpreted a pregnant woman’s dream With a cow, this indicates the arrival of happy and joyful news and is also an indication that she is carrying a male child, but if she sees a colored cow, this indicates that she will give birth. The woman, which is also an indication that she will undergo surgery and be exposed to some problems, and God Almighty knows best. Interpretation of seeing a cow in a dream by the Nabulsi scholar. The Nabulsi scholar interpreted seeing a cow in a dream as a sign of loss of trade and a great loss of money that will lead the dreamer to poverty and says that it indicates corruption of morals. The dreamer is exposed to certain diseases, problems, and circumstances. Misfortunes. Interpretation of seeing a cow in a dream according to the words of our Master Moses. In the story of our Master Moses, it was seen that seeing a cow in a dream indicates a lot of good and abundant sustenance, followed by extreme poverty and exposure to epidemics and disease. Interpretation of seeing a cow being slaughtered in a dream. The blind person interpreted seeing a cow being slaughtered in a dream as A sign of disagreements and problems in marital life leading to divorce, courtship that may fail for unmarried people, travel, traveling abroad, marrying a disabled man, and eating beef. Dream.Interpretation of seeing a white cow in a dream. Scientists interpreted seeing a cow in a dream as evidence of a lot of kindness and great living, as well as marriage, stability, and enjoying a life full of happiness here as well. Interpretation of seeing a dead cow in a dream. Scientists interpreted seeing a dead cow in a dream as evidence of many problems and difficulties that The dreamer faces it. It is also evidence of failure in marital life and divorce. It also indicates exposure to dangers and problems that may affect the dreamer’s life and cause many diseases, and God Almighty knows best. Interpretation of seeing a black cow in a dream. Scientists interpreted seeing a black cow in a dream as evidence of wealth and great fortune, as well as evidence of goodness, achieving many successes, and getting rid of problems. And worries and problems, and marriage in the near future for pious and rich unmarried people. A man who fears God and lives a full life

title: Interpretation of a dream about getting engaged in a man’s dream

preview.html: Seeing an engagement in the dream of a young man, married or unmarried, the engagement of his lover, his wife, a divorced woman, an unknown girl I do not know, or a girl I know, beautiful or ugly, dark, blonde, white, according to Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of engagement in a man’s dream. If a young man or single person sees that he is preparing or getting ready for an engagement to a girl. If he knows it, he will approach with caution an important issue or event in his life, such as taking on a new job, and the association may indicate the self and sometimes involvement in the vision in the vision. Make a precious wish. Interpretation of engagement or betrothal in a man’s dream according to the beauty and behavior of the fiancée in the dream. This world... Whoever dreams of getting engaged to a girl he knows who is unmarried and beautiful and has a good description, this indicates that he will get what he wants or that it is good news of happiness and joy. Those around him from his family or from work will force him to do something that he does against his will, and he knows that. And whoever sees that he is engaged to a woman whom he knows is married, this indicates that he is seeking something from this world, such as money, position, prestige, honor, or He will obtain it. Whoever proposes in his dream to a virgin or a girl he does not know, or a woman he has never seen before, this indicates that the position is near, if he is from the common people, and if he deserves a great one. location. The explanation for this is that he will obtain the position and authority of a state on earth. Whoever marries an adulteress, this sin will be returned to him and he will also be an adulterer. It is a matter beyond his control, as he indulges in drunkenness or actually marries the daughter of a high-ranking person if he is qualified to do so. Whoever dreams that he is engaged to a woman, he is trying to gain the world and gain from her what he obtained from the engagement. Whoever dreams: to be happy with the woman, this means It indicates his engagement and desire to marry her. Whoever sees: that he is engaged to a married woman, it is clear that he is seeking the world and it will not happen to him. Whoever dreams: that he marries a woman and she responds to his intention, and is beautiful with kindness, to prove that he will fulfill his desire and satisfy his need. Whoever dreams: that a woman proposes to him and wants him, then the world He leans toward him and he comes to him. Interpretation of an engagement to a non-Muslim in a dream: As for a woman engaged or married to a Jew, it indicates an act that is wrong due to the many sins involved. A work full of turmoil and falsehood, but if he is a Zoroastrian, this means that he enters a work without religion or contains major sins during his work. Interpretation of a girl engaged to me in a dreamWhoever saw a dream that an unmarried girl or girl came to his wedding or asked to marry him, this indicates The coming comfort in his life, the opening up of the world to him, and an increase either in food and money or in happiness, pleasure, and giving. Work. Interpretation of an engagement party in a dream. Whoever finds himself at an engagement party for himself or for others and is happy with what is going on around him, this indicates that he will get something from the world that he was looking for, but a wedding party is different from an engagement because a wedding celebration can indicate sadness, anguish, imprisonment, etc. Interpretation of dreams to share - YouTube

title: Interpretation of a dream about a bridge in a dream in detail

preview.html:
Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing the bridge in a dreamIbn Sirin interpreted who crosses the bridge or lends money to it in a dream. This dream indicates the changes that occur in the dreamer’s life and the change can be positive when the bridge extends over one or two banks. Whoever sees that he is crossing the broken bridge in the dream, this dream is a warning sign for the dreamer about something that is about to happen or the direction of an enemy that awaits you. The collapse of the bridge in The dream is a sign of death or failure in the life of the dreamer, and for a married person it could be a sign of divorce and separation. Interpretation of crossing a bridge in a dream: Whoever sees in a dream that he is crossing a high, high bridge. In a dream, this indicates entering a new phase in the life of the dreamer and there will be a radical change in it. If he is single, he will get married, and this event will be soon or short, depending on the extent of the bridge in the dream. And the unmarried woman who sees the high bridge in a dream, this indicates the many fears that she has and her need for security. And the married woman who sees the bridge in a dream and lends it to her, then this A sign of a radical change in her life, and this change is positive. It could be an increase and expansion of her livelihood or stability in her family life and children. A pregnant woman who dreams that she crosses a bridge easily and smoothly, this is a sign of an easy and quick birth, and seeing a bridge in a dream can mean that the baby is a male. A divorced woman who sees that she is crossing a bridge in a dream, This is a sign that she is going through a sad and stressful stage in her life and that her future life will be better, God willing. As for the widow who sees in her dream that she is crossing a bridge, this dream indicates that she has passed the stage of sadness, pain and separation. I saw him crossing the bridge easily and successfully. Interpretation of seeing a suspension bridge in a dream: Seeing a high suspension bridge in a dream indicates a dangerous and decisive stage in the dreamer’s life, such as taking a student exam or being exposed to financial risks as a result of taking on a legitimate job that ends successfully and has a positive impact on the dreamer’s life.
ZOE. A high suspension bridge for an unmarried woman indicates a man of high status and has a lot of knowledge and knowledge. A suspension bridge for a married woman in a dream indicates a home free of problems and a bulwark from financial crises. A pregnant woman who sees a suspension bridge in a dream indicates an early and easy birth. For divorced women who dream of a suspension bridge, this dream symbolizes her divorced husband and his inability to return to him. For a widow who sees a suspension bridge in a dream, this indicates that her husband is in exile and that he is deprived of a high and good position in the afterlife. Interpretation of a bridge falling in a dream: A bridge that falls or Collapse in a dream indicates a break in the relationship between people and a break in kinship. For a man who sees a bridge collapsing in a dream, this dream is a sign of failure in managing his affairs. An unmarried woman who sees a bridge collapsing in a dream, this is a sign of the collapse of her emotional relationship. And a wife who sees If a bridge collapses in a dream, this indicates many marital problems and may...

title: Interpretation of a dream about lice for a woman: seeing lice in a dream

preview.html: Contents: A dream about lice in the hair and killing it, for an unmarried woman, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a Shaiban girl, for Imam Al-Sadiq, for Ibn Shirin, for a white dream. Lice to kill from the hair of the head, and more Seeing lice in a dream Seeing lice in a dream or a dream in general indicates the world and money. Whoever sees in his dream that lice are walking on his new clothes, if he has a position or privilege, then this position will be renewed for him. Whoever sees in his dream lice walking On an old, damaged dress, this is a debt that he fears will not recover. And whoever sees lice walking on the ground, this indicates the weakness of people, and if he sees lice biting them, they are weak and unjust. Whoever sees a louse flying from him or from his chest, then the boy or the worker who works for him or his son leaves him, a vision Lice from the king refers to soldiers and enemies. If the dreamer is a minister, then the lice is in gratitude. If he is a teacher or professor, he refers to the students, and if he is sick, then the lice indicates a long-term illness. Whoever dreams of throwing a live louse, the dreamer comes with an order that is contrary to the Sunnah. And whoever sees A lot of lice, then the dream indicates miserable, wretched and humble people and a lot of immorality, and it was said: This is good and relieves one from worries. And whoever is sick and sees a lot of lice, this dream means long-term illness, loss and waste of goods and money, and if he kills her in a dream, this is relief from hardships. Whoever sees in a dream that he has been bitten by lice, then there are weak people who curse him with bad words, and whoever collects lice from clothes, he is deceiving obscene lies. Whoever sees that a lot of lice in his dream are crawling and approaching him, then he will assume leadership or a position over many people, or He rules over many people, or is assigned a part in public affairs. If lice emerge from it in abundance and in large numbers, then his livelihood will increase with the permission of his Lord, and many will come to him from Yemen. Whoever dreams that lice are invading his body and eating his flesh, this means that his children will eat their money. Whoever sees a lot Of lice on his body, unpleasant things will happen to him in the future and there will be no good in him, whether the lice are in his hair or on the rest of his body. Whoever kills a louse or a small number will harm his servant or someone who is less qualified than him. So whoever sees in a dream two or more sexual intercourse or that lice He multiplies in his dream by spitting, then this indicates a quarrel with the one who witnessed sexual intercourse and the multiplication of lice. Lice in a dream refer to the world and money, and many lice in a dream indicate torment and can be a blessing, blessing, goodness, and salvation from worries and sorrows. Lice refer to weak people, and gossip. And for the sick, their illness will be prolonged. For kings, lice are soldiers and enemies. If a louse is found on a new shirt, this indicates the renewal of the mandate, and if it is on a shirt It is an ancient religion that he fears. And if he sees that his lice have flown from his chest, then his son, servant, or servant will stay away from him. You have a dream that confuses you. You are waiting for it.. Google is an Egyptian website for interpreting dreams. Interpretation of a dream about betrayal of someone you love. In fact, the fear of betrayal can make a person see that he is exposed to it in a dream. Psychologists said in This topic is that a patient suffering from anxiety and obsessive-compulsive disorder and a person suffering from phobias and pathological fears can see such visions, which means that an obsessed patient can dream of his wife cheating on him. A person who fears that his lover will break up with him sees in his dream that he loves another person and cheats on him with him. Therefore, the dream has clear psychological reasons that psychologists mentioned in abundance. As for the jurists interested in the world of interpretation of visions and dreams, they interpreted this dream from another angle, which is that the dream can be interpreted as real betrayal, but this interpretation is never put forward unless there are elements Many in. The dream is like the following: Whether or not: A young man sees that his girlfriend or fiancée took off her engagement ring and put on a ring that another young man gave her, then this is a sign that she is cheating on him with another man, and she intends to leave the dreamer and get married. This man. Second: If the fortuneteller buys shoes for his girlfriend as a gift for waking up, and sees her taking them off her feet and putting on another shoe that is more expensive than them, and she is pleased with the new shoes, the vision shows his distance from her feet. His girlfriend for reasons of her own, the most important of which is that she will leave him and go to another young man whose financial situation is stronger than him. Third: When the dreamer sees that his lover is eating white honey with a young man he does not know, and the characteristics of their love and passion were clear in the dream, then he loves this young man and establishes an emotional relationship with him in Present tense. Fourth: If he saw her turning into a wolf, a poisonous snake, or a scorpion, then she is a spoiled girl, and one of her personality traits is treachery and harming others. Fifth: If he saw her in a dream, she sat with him in his car and they argued together, and she left the car and got into another, (indicating that this scene did not happen Indeed, even a dream is not an obsession and a simple recollection of events from the past). Interpretation of a dream about betrayal of a lover by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin showed that if a young man cheats on his girlfriend in a dream, knowing that he never thought about cheating on her in reality because of his great love for her, There is no need to worry about the vision, because the scene indicates a lot. Changes and successes in his work, especially if he sees that he is dating a beautiful girl alongside the lover of his dreams, then this is a very profitable and new business. When the dreamer suffers psychologically from seeing his lover’s betrayal in the dream, this is a bad vision and a metaphor for the pains and problems that he suffers from in his life, and he may fear bad events that may occur. Affect him in life. Future. But if the dreamer commits bad behavior and repeatedly deceives his lover

title: Interpretation of seeing a cow in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a cow in a dreamToday and through it getting wetWe will talk about the interpretation of seeing a cow in a dream. Scientists have interpreted seeing a cow in a dream as a sign of great kindness and great sustenance.Interpretation of seeing a cow in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing a cow in a dream as evidence of a lot of goodness and longevity. . It also indicates that the owners of this country are generous. However, if this cow is skinny, this indicates the interruption of goodness, the spread of epidemics and diseases, lack of livelihood, and exposure to many problems and troubles, and God Almighty knows best. Interpretation of seeing a cow in a dream for a single woman. Scientists interpreted the vision of an unmarried girl in a dream about a cow as a sign that she will get married soon, as It indicates a lot of sustenance and kindness. Interpretation of seeing a cow in a dream for a married woman. Scientists interpreted a married woman’s vision of a cow in a dream as indicating the enormous wealth and goodness that she may obtain, and the coming will be better and more beautiful. Interpretation of seeing a cow in a dream for a pregnant woman. Scientists interpreted a pregnant woman’s dream With a cow, this indicates the arrival of happy and joyful news and is also an indication that she is carrying a male child, but if she sees a colored cow, this indicates that she will give birth. The woman, which is also an indication that she will undergo surgery and be exposed to some problems, and God Almighty knows best. Interpretation of seeing a cow in a dream by the Nabulsi scholar. The Nabulsi scholar interpreted seeing a cow in a dream as a sign of loss of trade and a great loss of money that will lead the dreamer to poverty and says that it indicates corruption of morals. The dreamer is exposed to certain diseases, problems, and circumstances. Misfortunes. Interpretation of seeing a cow in a dream according to the words of our Master Moses.
